rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment discusses future announcements without high-potency language.
The segment describes future expectations ('expects to have more announcements').
Segment does not contain a question.
The segment does not contain explicit calming language or cues for reassurance.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes expected future communication about a resource ('expects to have more announcements on H5N1 vaccines').
